config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration _journalSizeThreshold is used in the journal method to set the size threshold for the journal. It is passed as a parameter to the PersistentJournal constructor along with other parameters.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration _journalSizeThreshold is triggered whenever the journal method is called, which depends on the logic flow of the application.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The _journalSizeThreshold configuration option impacts the size threshold for the journal. Setting it to a higher value may allow for more data to be stored in the journal before it needs to be rotated or archived, while setting it to a lower value may result in more frequent rotation or archiving of the journal.
